product.title: Capri Vision Ochre Day And Night Blind
product.description: Draw your scheme together with this cheerful fabric window blind. The capri vision ochre day and night roller blind is sure to make an impact on your space thanks to the bright ochre yellow hue and practical functionality. This blind is designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst filling your interior with natural light. relproducts.title: Stirlo Scarlett Red
relproducts.description: Stirloscarlett red plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.
